Class JCommon

Direct Known Subclasses:
JDelete, JInsert, JLoad, JLockTable, JqlSelect, JSaveFile, JUnLockTable, JUpdate
public class JCommon
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for the JQL statement objects.

Ben Faul

                                             throws java.lang.Exception
Evaluate embedded JSON, where the keys are in the form a_b_c_d_. (d of c of b of a).

Parameters:
arg - String. The keys of the embedded JSON
tuple - ZTuple. The current row.
Returns:
String. The JSON at d_.
Throws:
Exception. - Throws exceptions on JSON encoding errors.

evaluateRootJson

public static java.lang.Object evaluateRootJson(java.lang.Integer depth,
                                                java.lang.String[] args,
                                                java.lang.Object value)
Recursively evaluate the value of embedded JSON.

Parameters:
depth - int. The current index into args[].
args - String[]. The array of JSON keys.
value - Object. The value of the JSON at args[args.length].
Returns:
Object. The value of the field a.b.c.d, if args[] = {a,b,c,d}.

returnValueFromConstant

public java.lang.Object returnValueFromConstant(ZConstant zcon)
Given an SQL constant object, return its value. The value is encoded as string and needs to be converted to the proper object (String or Number) of the indicated type.

Parameters:
zcon - ZConstant. The SQL constant object.
Returns:
Object. The value represented by the object.

                               java.lang.Object value)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
Sets the value in the indicated column (value into Map at key).

Parameters:
map - Map. The table 'row'
column - String. The column name to set in the row (the Map key).
evaluator - ZEval. Evaluates the right hand side of an assignment (e.g.30/2);
tuple - ZTuple. The current row to be evaluated.
value - Object. The value to set at the indicated column.

java.lang.Exception

getNextIndex

                                  java.lang.String name)
Return the next index of the table.

Parameters:
indexes - Map. The index map.
name - String. The name of the table.
Returns:
double. Returns the next index to use for this table, or -1 if no index is on this table.
